Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two bands in added white; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx to left (hair, part of wing with added red and underbelly remaining); single dot from possible fugitive colour.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0887) (phase 2)
